First, we are going to load the tidyverse package.

```{r}
library(tidyverse) #Loading necessary package
```


# Creating a tibble

```{r}
tribble(~number, ~letter,   ~greek,
              1,     "a",  "alpha",
              2,     "b",   "beta",
              3,     "c",  "gamma")
```
